TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class COMPropertyInfo : System.Reflection.PropertyInfo, Microsoft.JScript.MemberInfoInitializer
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit COMPropertyInfo extends System.Reflection.PropertyInfo implements class Microsoft.JScript.MemberInfoInitializer
Public NotInheritable Class COMPropertyInfo Inherits PropertyInfo Implements MemberInfoInitializer
public ref class COMPropertyInfo sealed : System::Reflection::PropertyInfo, Microsoft::JScript::MemberInfoInitializer

summary.span: JScript에서 외부 COM 속성과 통신할 수 있도록 활성화합니다.

span.span: Enables JScript to communicate with an external COM property.

summary.span: JScript에서 외부 개체에 바인딩하려면 관리되는 가 필요하기 때문에 외부 COM 구현에서 이 클래스를 사용하여 해당 개체를 JScript에 노출합니다.

span.span: This class is used by an external COM implementation to expose its objects to JScript because JScript needs a managed in order to bind to an external object.
